products.title: Utopia White Vertical Blind
products.description: The sharpness of white is softened by a subtle woven texture to this clean, bright fabric, which dazzles with its classy simplicity. Combine that with the robust practicality of a vertical blind and you have a versatile window covering thatll bring luminosity to any space.
